# omega-reheat

## What's this ?

This component is in charge to show a button for trigger a graph reset.

To know what a graph reset is, check `omega-graph`'s documentation.

| Event               | Description | Type                |
| ------------------- | ----------- | ------------------- |
| `omega-reset.reset` |             | `CustomEvent<void>` |
